Package com.jme3.bullet.objects

Class MultiBodyCollider

java.lang.Object
com.jme3.bullet.NativePhysicsObject
com.jme3.bullet.collision.PhysicsCollisionObject
com.jme3.bullet.objects.MultiBodyCollider
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme3.export.Savable, com.jme3.util.clone.JmeCloneable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<PhysicsCollisionObject>
public class MultiBodyCollider
extends PhysicsCollisionObject
A collision object for a link or base in a MultiBody, based on Bullet's btMultiBodyLinkCollider.
